doc.summary: A <ref cls="net/minecraft/client/renderer/blockentity/BlockEntityRenderer">BlockEntityRenderer</ref> that before calling the actual render code rotates the <ref cls="com/mojang/blaze3d/vertex/PoseStack">PoseStack</ref>  depending on the facing.
doc.text: A <ref cls="net/minecraft/client/renderer/blockentity/BlockEntityRenderer">BlockEntityRenderer</ref> that before calling the actual render code rotates the <ref cls="com/mojang/blaze3d/vertex/PoseStack">PoseStack</ref>  depending on the facing. This may only be used with blocks that have the property <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/block/state/properties/BlockStateProperties" field="FACING">BlockStateProperties#FACING</ref>.  The <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/level/block/entity/BlockEntity">block entity</ref> should be rendered as if it was facing up.
